title: Black's picturesque tourist of Scotland.
snippet: bottom of a narrow and thickly wooded dell, through which a small rivulet, called the Braid Burn, strays.

title: His Dearest Wish. A novel
author: Ware, Mary Clementina Hibbert.
snippet: Extending their rambles,they would wander amongst the BraidHills, where the fresh autumnal breeze wasladen with the fragrance of heather andjuniper, and try to catch trout in the littlecrystal Braid Burn.

title: By Adverse Winds. [A novel.]
author: Smeaton, William Henry Oliphant.
snippet: The hamlet is situated on the banks of a little stream,the Braid Burn, over which the road is carried by an ancientbridge.
